oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Lebesgue measure of escaping sets of entire functions of completely regular growth
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bergweiler, Walter
Chyzhykov, Igor
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Complex Variables
Mathematics - Dynamical Systems
37F10, 30D05, 30D15
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We give conditions ensuring that the Julia set and the escaping set of an entire function of completely regular growth have positive Lebesgue measure. The essential hypotheses are that the indicator is positive except perhaps at isolated points and that most zeros are located in neighborhoods of finitely many rays. We apply the result to solutions of linear differential equations.
Comment: 27 pages; Theorem 1.5 and its proof revised; some overall revision
